title: Algorithmic Influence Operations: Automated Crypto Corruption
description: Investigate how automated trading systems execute influence operations based on political developments, creating algorithmic corruption that operates without human coordination or prosecutable evidence.
research_areas: Which trading algorithms show correlation with political events?
How do automated systems time purchases with policy announcements?
What cross-platform integration exists between crypto and social media manipulation?
How do real-time analytics optimize corruption effectiveness?
Which technical platforms enable algorithmic influence operations?
source_requirements: Trading algorithm specifications, correlation analyses, platform integration records, effectiveness metrics
pdf_source: The Capture Cascade - Part 5_ The Breakthrough.pdf
